extension.author: 步步街

extension.description: This module will display available domains.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: pretext
field.label: Pre-Text

field.name: label
field.label: Label

field.name: buttontext
field.label: Button Text

field.name: checkall
field.label: Check All Text

field.name: resulttext
field.label: Result

field.name: forwardurl
field.label: Forward URL
field.description: If you would like the form to foward the person to another page after submitting the forum enter the entire url, please note the module must also be published to this page.
